text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityCode
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    VCCNEVaccineA Type of medicine that creates an immune protection without the recipient experiencing the disease.
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v3-xMedicine

name: XAdministeredSubstance
title: x_AdministeredSubstance
description: A type of Manufactured Material that is administered to a living subject, either by a healthcare professional or auto-administered, within a healthcare context.
